# f5distributedcloud_subnet (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_subnet` resource manages Subnets in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Subnets define IP address ranges within virtual networks.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_subnet" "example" {
  name        = "my-subnet"
  namespace   = "system"
  description = "Application subnet"
  cidr        = "10.0.1.0/24"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cidr` (String) CIDR block for the subnet.
- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
